name: Framed Wings
description: Work by Rodrigo Cid and Jão das Artes. The frame presents a critique of the world of art: it is fragmented as a symbol of commercial exhibitions held by art institutions. The butterflies flying within the frame represent the loop in which the artists are trapped, albeit with the lightness of butterflies in their artistic production. / Golden frame made of frame pieces: Rodrigo Cid; Glitch of butterflies with film fragments: Jão das Artes
